outputs.output_descr: The Biodiversity Finance Initiative (BIOFIN) aims to build Transformative Policy and Financing Frameworks to Increase Investment in Biodiversity Management

The Biodiversity Finance Initiative (BIOFIN) aims to build Transformative Policy and Financing Frameworks to Increase Investment in Biodiversity Management

This project will provide an expedited mechanism for development, submission and approval of countries’ proposals (individual funding requests of up to $20,000 benefiting 90 countries) for their 2010 Biodiversity Targets National Assessments.
The Biodiversity Finance Initiative (BIOFIN) aims to build Transformative Policy and Financing Frameworks to Increase Investment in Biodiversity Management.
